Flatiron School Events

Let's meet and talk code.

  • Lock Picking Class

    June 26, 2013

    We are honored to announce that Schuyler Towne, a master lockpicker and mechanical security researcher, will be visiting The Flatiron School on June 26th!

    Sign Up →

  • Flatiron Summer Program for High School Students

    June 17-28, 2013

    Class will run M-F, 9 am - 3pm + a few optional afterhours field trips. All classes held on location in the Flatiron, New York, NY

    Apply Now →

  • NYC on Rails Meetup

    Every Thursday at 7pm

    Discuss all Ruby and Ruby on Rails related topics, meet other developers and other interesting folks. See Flatrion Presents, a presentation series from Flatiron School students.

    RSVP Now →
